glosses: by chance, as a result of a coincidence, accidentally

examples.text: Travnik benim tesadüfen keşfettiğim bir şehir.
examples.translation: Travnik is a city I discovered as a result of a coincidence.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish تصادفاً (tesādüfen), from Arabic تَصَادُفًا (taṣādufan) adverbial accusative of تَصَادُف (taṣāduf, “coincidence”), verbal noun of تَصَادَفَ (taṣādafa, “to meet by chance”). Compare Uzbek tasodifan, Uyghur تاسادىپەن (tasadipen) and Azerbaijani təsadüfən.
